title: Set up Zig test harness and project test structure
body:
Establish the testing conventions and infrastructure for the project.

**Deliverables:**
- Document testing conventions: where tests live, naming, how to run
- Ensure `zig build test` runs all unit tests across all modules
- Add a `test` step to `build.zig` that discovers and runs tests from all source modules
- Create a sample test in `src/` to validate the setup works
- Add test instructions to README or a CONTRIBUTING.md section

**Design notes:**
- Zig's built-in `test` blocks are the unit test mechanism
- Each pipeline module (lexer, parser, etc.) will have its own `test` blocks
- `build.zig` should have a `test` step that exercises everything
